bibl.title: A Papyrus Collection of the Greek Papyrological Society.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I
bibl.author: MANDILARAS, Basil

bibl.note: Modified version of: IDEM, A Papyrus Collection of the Greek Papyrological Society, EEAth 29 (1986-1991) pp. 217-240, 11 pll. - Presents 7 papyri, to be published in P. Gr. Pap. Soc. in 1991. The provenance of Nos 1-6 is Oxyrhynchus: 1. Inv. M2. Part of the ég∆n ÑOmÆrou ka‹ ÑHsiÒdou attributed to Alcidamas. First century B.C. [see also: IDEM, A New Papyrus Fragment of the Certamen Homeri et Hesiodi, Platon 42 (1990) Nos 83-84, pp. 45-51, 1 fig.]; - 2. Inv. M1. Letter; - 3. Inv. M3. Marriage contract. First century A.D.; - 4. Inv. M7. Letter. End of second or early third century A.D.; - [5]. Inv. M8. Receipt for the purchase of meat and barley. V or VI A.D.; - [6]. Inv. M9. Letter. Byzantine period.; - [7]. Inv. F1 19. List of names. Second century B.C. <agon Homerou kai Hesiodou>
MANDILARAS Basil, A Papyrus Collection of the Greek Papyrological Society.
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. I (Cairo, 1992) pp. 583-602, 9 pll.
141.4 P. Athen. Soc. Pap. Inv. F1 19; M1; M2; M3; M7; M8; M9
